title: Huanlong Apple Watch Band Series 1 Series 2, Stainless Steel Strap Band w/Adapter+Case Cover for Apple Watch iWatch 38/42mm (H Gold 42mm)
feature: Fit wrist design: Carefully designed according to the wrist, Wear comfortable.Fine buffing & fine grinding surface.
Defender series plating cover case made with high strength PC material keep the smart watch safe and free from scratches
The plated case is ultra slim 0.5 mm & ultra light weight make it easy to carry, easily remove or install wristband with case equipped on watch
Built-in stainless steel connection adapters, allow you to easily Replacement watchband. 3 pointers watch band in 4 colors: silver,black,gold,rosegold

NOTE: The adapter is replaceable, Please tighten the screws on the adapters before using. Please checking up the condition of screws on the adapters regularly (every 3-5 weeks a time) in case of falling off accidently due to loose screws
description: Suitable for wrist circumference: Apple Watch 38mm Band - Suitable for 150-220mm Wrist size. Apple Watch 42mm Band - Suitable for 155-225mm Wrist size. Packing Includes: 1 X Watch Band1 XPlated PC case cover for apple watch 1 X Screw driver 1 X Removal tool 2 X Spare screws [Note] [Read Before Placing Your Order] 1. No Apple Watch Included. 2. Screw driver is used to install/uninstall connector adapter, not for removing links. 3, Please use the removal tool to adjust the band size as your wrists. 4, Any questions or unsatisfied with your purchasing, please contact with us.
